snippet: A birthday party on Sunday for the Rev. Man Ho Lee was an unwelcome distraction from the mission he has had for the past several weeks: to keep his terminally ill daughter alive.
abstract: Birthday party for the Rev Man Ho Lee in Flushing, Queens, serves as an unwelcome distraction from the pastor's passionate mission to keep his terminally ill daughter SungEun Grace alive in the face of her communicated requests to be removed from life support.
lead_paragraph: A birthday party on Sunday for the Rev. Man Ho Lee was an unwelcome distraction from the mission he has had for the past several weeks: to keep his terminally ill daughter alive.

headline.seo: Grim Birthday for Rev. Man Ho Lee, Fighting to Keep Daughter Alive
headline.main: For Pastor Trying to Keep Daughter Alive, Party Is Grim
headline.print_headline: Solemn Day as a Pastor’s Daughter Lies Near Death
